Creates a tibble from All Combinations

Source: R/expand_tibble.R
expand_tibble.Rd

Actually a wrapper for expand.grid, but character vectors will stay as characters.

Usage

expand_tibble(...)

Arguments

...

vectors, factors or a list containing these.

Value

See expand.grid but instead of a data.frame a tibble is returned.

See also

expand.grid

Author

Marsel Scheer

Examples


expand_tibble(fun = "rnorm", mean = 1:4, sd = 2:5)
#> # A tibble: 16 × 3
#>    fun    mean    sd
#>    <chr> <int> <int>
#>  1 rnorm     1     2
#>  2 rnorm     2     2
#>  3 rnorm     3     2
#>  4 rnorm     4     2
#>  5 rnorm     1     3
#>  6 rnorm     2     3
#>  7 rnorm     3     3
#>  8 rnorm     4     3
#>  9 rnorm     1     4
#> 10 rnorm     2     4
#> 11 rnorm     3     4
#> 12 rnorm     4     4
#> 13 rnorm     1     5
#> 14 rnorm     2     5
#> 15 rnorm     3     5
#> 16 rnorm     4     5
